clock.description: Report time. POSIX epoch format. Time should be the time generated by flight hardware if possible

ident.description: Callsign identifying the flight. Typically, ICAO airline code plus IATA/ticketing flight number, or the aircraft registration

atcident.description: Identifier used for ATC, if it differs from flight identifier

lat.description: Latitude in decimal degrees, rounded to 5 decimal points

lon.description: Longitude in decimal degrees, rounded to 5 decimal points

nav_altitude.description: The altitude setting, in feet, from the navigation equipment (Mode-S)

nav_heading.description: The heading, in degrees, from the navigation equipment (Mode-S)

vertRate.description: The aircraft's vertical rate of climb/descent derived from pressure altitude, reported in feet per minute. (version 21.0+)
